job.title: Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer (remote)
job.description: Looking for a <strong>data scientist / machine learning engineer </strong>to join us to work models based on the construction data + public data sets that would help to build The Internet in US rural areas where, today, people have poor service, or no service at all.<br><ul><li>learning business</li><li>converting business to technical ideas</li><li>converting these ideas to computer programs and models</li></ul> <strong>Three Must Have Technical Skill Sets<br></strong><ul><li>fast.ai / PyTorch</li><li>Python / Clojure</li><li>pandas</li></ul> <strong>Three “Nice to have” Technical Skills<br></strong><ul><li>scikit-learn</li><li>deep learning</li><li>data visualization (not via packaged software, but via libs like “seaborn”, “ggplot”, etc.)</li></ul>
